sub_title: Data Scientist | Researcher | PhD in Chemistry
summary:
Data Scientist with PhD in Chemistry: deep learning, computer vision, data analysis, and ceramics. About 10 years of experience in researching in Russian and German research centres. 
 
ðŸ“Œ Passionate about the novel technologies and approaches. The main interest is laid in Computer Vision and its application in Science and Business e.g. objects detection and segmentation, image reconstruction, etc.

Currently looking for a position in Machine Learning (Computer Vision) area with application in Material Science or other fields.

ðŸ“Œ My research field in Materials Science was ceramics, experimental determination of phase diagrams and novel methods of sintering.
